messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/30/07 11:04:30 AM, abzb@... writes:


> I don't know of any conferences but we have an unschoolers group 
> which meets each week in Santa Monica.  Come on down! Afterwards, a 
> bunch of us go out to dinner so the traffic doesn't become a big 
> issue for people coming from farther away.
>
> You can find us here: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/smwla/
>

I'll look into that! I'm really far away from there...I'm out in Claremont :(
But maybe I can try it out! Money is REALLY tight thought - so between gas
and then staying later for dinner - might be a slightly less than ,onthly thing
- but sure sounds worth each cent spent! Thanks again!!

Karen

messages.subject: Re: US Conference in Los Angeles area?
messages.msgSnippet: I haven t been for years but I enjoyed the Link conference.  It isn t all unschooling but they usually have some unschooling things, and it is kid friendly.
messages.messageBody:
I haven't been for years but I enjoyed the Link conference. It isn't
all unschooling but they usually have some unschooling things, and it is
kid friendly. http://www.californiahomeschoolconference.com/ Looks
like it will be in Agoura Hills in 2008.

Jill

messages.subject: Re: US Conference in Los Angeles area?
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know of any conferences but we have an unschoolers group which meets each week in Santa Monica.  Come on down! Afterwards, a bunch of us go out to
messages.messageBody:
I don't know of any conferences but we have an unschoolers group
which meets each week in Santa Monica. Come on down! Afterwards, a
bunch of us go out to dinner so the traffic doesn't become a big
issue for people coming from farther away.

You can find us here: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/smwla/

Alison and Asher (8)

Ok, done now :)

Karen...in So. Cal, lol! Near LA! :)
